title: Swaying Palm Tree
description: Balancing, Core, Standing, Warm-ups Primary body parts engaged Middle Back / Lats, Shoulders, Upper Back & Lower Traps, Wrists Stretches abdominal organs How to perform Swaying Palm Tree Stand with your feet wider than your shoulders. With an inhale, stretch your palms toward the sky, fingers interlocked. Bend to the right with an exhale. Do not move your hips.
alignment_cues: Maintain steady breath throughout the pose
Keep proper alignment based on pose type
Listen to your body and modify as needed
